field.name: spacer_dlid
field.label: You need to specify your Download ID before you can receive updates for CedPhotoFeed. Visit https://www.galaxiis.com/member/ with a valid subscription to get the Download Id..

field.name: downloadid
field.label: Download Id
field.description: Defines the parameters necessary to automatically update the extension. Visit https://www.galaxiis.com/member/ with a valid subscription to get the Download Id.
